title: League of Legends launcher wont start!
body: I recently had to reset my computer to its default settings so I had to re download everything  but a few days after I did this whenever I clicked the League of Legends shortcut it just loaded for a few seconds then it shuts itself down and iv tried everything i could find to get it working. but i think it might be League of legends not installing all the way because there is nothing in downloads solutions and temp. Pls help me this is mu favorite game and i haven't been able to play it in a while.

replies.body:
Hey there! 

It may have something to do with your firewall. You can check out this Permissions guide and it should fix you up: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions

If it continues and you're still unable to get into game, you should probably send in a ticket to Riot's tech team.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
i got it working thanks for the help
